item.description:
Hey incubators....we will end up being in the smallest room at the democracy center, i.e. as soon as you walk in to the right tonight.

If you arrive and can't get in or we have moved, call me at 617-869-1551. See you there tonight.


Incubators!!

Let's gather, relax, and laugh together!!

Come on out to our usual stomping grounds for another week of fun improv games and excitement!

I'll be running through a ton of new games I've picked up from recent workshops I've attended.

For all of those that have joined but haven't been out to one of our meetups yet, make this your first!! Remember, no previous improv experience required. And for you improv incubator regulars, I've missed you!! So come and play!

I hope to see a ton of you on Thursday!!

Any questions? Let me know!

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear some unique from my wardrobe just for you.
item.name: Tremors (of Laughter) 3: Back to Improv! NOTE: we will be in a different room!
